AppGateway2 - dependencies/install layout report
Generated: 2026-01-05

Scope:
- Inspect dependencies/install layout for include/lib/cmake/etc presence.
- Confirm presence and exact paths of:
  - libWPEFrameworkAppGateway.so
  - WPEFramework Core/Plugins libraries
  - AppGateway config files under etc

1) Directory layout (observed)
- dependencies/install/
  - include/
    - WPEFramework/
      - Modules/
  - sbin/
    - ConfigGenerator/
    - JsonGenerator/
      - schemas/
      - source/
    - ProxyStubGenerator/

Not observed under dependencies/install (not present in scan):
- lib/
- lib/plugins/ (or wpeframework/plugins)
- etc/
- lib/cmake/ (or any cmake package directory)

2) include paths
Present:
- dependencies/install/include/WPEFramework/Modules/FindConfigGenerator.cmake
- dependencies/install/include/WPEFramework/Modules/FindJsonGenerator.cmake
- dependencies/install/include/WPEFramework/Modules/FindProxyStubGenerator.cmake

Not present (in install prefix):
- dependencies/install/include/WPEFramework/Core/**
- dependencies/install/include/core/**
- dependencies/install/include/WPEFramework/plugins/**

3) lib + plugin .so artifacts
Search results under dependencies/install:
- libWPEFrameworkAppGateway.so: NOT FOUND
- libWPEFramework*.so*: NOT FOUND
- any directory containing "plugins": NOT FOUND

4) cmake package directories
Observed only:
- Find*.cmake modules under dependencies/install/include/WPEFramework/Modules/

Not observed:
- dependencies/install/lib/cmake/**
- dependencies/install/*Config.cmake package directories

5) etc / config
- dependencies/install/etc/**: NOT FOUND
- AppGateway config under install prefix: NOT FOUND

Conclusion:
Current dependencies/install contains only include/WPEFramework/Modules Find*.cmake and sbin tooling.
No libraries/plugins/config were found under this install prefix in the performed scan.
